question.title: GWT Test Fails: “No source code is available for type org.json.JSONObject; did you forget to inherit a required module?”
question.body:
I’m trying to write a GWT library with a separate test module, but whenever I run my HttpClientTest, GWT complains that it can’t find org.json.JSONObject or org.json.JSONArray:

HttpClient.gwt.xml

<module>
  <inherits name="com.google.gwt.core.Core"/>
  <inherits name="com.google.gwt.user.User"/>
  <inherits name="com.google.gwt.i18n.I18N"/>
  <inherits name="com.google.gwt.json.JSON"/>
  <inherits name="com.google.common.collect.Collect"/>
  <inherits name="io.reactivex.RxJava"/>
  <inherits name="org.JSON"/>
  <inherits name="elemental2.dom.Dom"/>

  <set-property name="gwt.logging.enabled" value="TRUE"/>
  <source path="client"/>
</module>

HttpClientTest.gwt.xml

<module rename-to="HttpTest">
  <inherits name="com.mycompany.http.HttpClient"/>
  <source path="client"/>
</module>

JSON.gwt.xml (in src/main/java/org/JSON.gwt.xml)

<module rename-to="JSON">
  <inherits name="com.google.gwt.core.Core"/>
  <inherits name="com.google.gwt.user.User"/>
  <inherits name="com.google.gwt.i18n.I18N"/>
  <inherits name="com.google.gwt.json.JSON"/>
  <set-property name="gwt.logging.enabled" value="TRUE"/>
  <source path="json"/>
</module>

Project layout (simplified):

JSON library

src/
  main/
    java/org/JSON.gwt.xml
    java/org/json/JSONObject.java
    java/org/json/JSONArray.java

HttpClient library

src/
  main/
    java/com/mycompany/http/HttpClient.gwt.xml
    java/com/mycompany/http/client/HttpClient.java
  test/
    java/com/mycompany/http/client/HttpClientTest.java

Error output:

[ERROR] Line 62: No source code is available for type org.json.JSONObject; did you forget to inherit a required module?
[ERROR] Line 86: No source code is available for type org.json.JSONArray; did you forget to inherit a required module?

I’ve inherited org.JSON in my main module and I believe the location of JSON.gwt.xml is correct. What am I missing? How can I get GWT to see org.json.JSONObject and org.json.JSONArray in my test module?
